title: WhatsApp may soon let you link your secondary smartphone
content:
In July last year, WhatsApp rolled out one of the most requested features: multi-device support. While the feature finally enabled WhatsApp users to access their favorite instant messaging app on up to four devices, there was a catch: you could only link a non-phone device. The post WhatsApp may soon let you link your secondary smartphone appeared first on XDA.
description: WhatsApp is working on a new "Register Device as Companion" page that will allow users to link their WhatsApp account to their secondary smartphone.
